name: Abyssal razor
desc: A knife from the deep.

name: Ancient bark spear
desc: Despite its gnarled look, this spear is strong and perfectly balanced.

name: Arbalest
desc: A slow but powerful weapon.

name: Ash Fang
desc: Risen again from the ashes, this bow holds unyielding strength.

name: Banded shield
desc: Banded with hoops of iron, a true warrior's companion.

name: Battleaxe
desc: Skull-splitter, a warrior's joy.

name: Berserkir axes
desc: Let your rage take over and face the slaughter.

name: Bile bomb
desc: Handle with care.

name: Black metal missile
desc: These thick missiles can punch through the hide of even the toughest of foes.

name: Black metal shield
desc: Fashioned from the strongest metal, able to turn even the deadliest blades.

name: Black metal tower shield
desc: A tower shield of gleaming dark metal.

name: Blackmetal atgeir
desc: A vicious hewing-axe of almost unbreakable black metal.

name: Blackmetal axe
desc: A perfectly-balanced axe forged from dark metal with an emerald sheen.

name: Blackmetal bolt
desc: A sleek bolt of dark metal.

name: Blackmetal knife
desc: A darkling blade. Strong and sharp.

name: Blackmetal sword
desc: A thing of death and beauty. It catches the light with a greenish glow.

name: Bone bolt
desc: A crude bolt of yellowed bone.

name: Bone tower shield
desc: The bones of dead warriors make for a good protection.

name: Bronze atgeir
desc: A true warrior's tool.

name: Bronze axe
desc: A bright and burnished blade, curved like a smile.

name: Bronze buckler
desc: A shield of burnished bronze, good to turn a blade or two.

name: Bronze mace
desc: A headache on a stick.

name: Bronze spear
desc: A sturdy spear with a head of burnished bronze.

name: Bronze sword
desc: Blood-drinker. A thirsty friend.

name: Bronzehead arrow
desc: Sharper than flint. A sleek messenger of death.

name: Butcher knife
desc: A butcher's knife designed specifically for slaughtering tamed animals.

name: Carapace arrow
desc: Heavy and pointy, this one's gonna hurt.

name: Carapace bolt
desc: A heavy and solid bolt.

name: Carapace buckler
desc: The skull of a seeker is solid but not heavy, which makes it perfect for a small and agile shield.

name: Carapace shield
desc: The almost unbreakable carapace of your enemies makes an excellent shield.

name: Carapace spear
desc: Sharpened to jagged perfection, this spear is sure to be deadly.

name: Charred arrow
desc: This arrow has been whittled into shape from a charred femur, and it's as hard as any metal.

name: Charred bolt
desc: A sturdy bone from a forearm, shaped into a deadly bolt.

name: Club
desc: A crude but useful weapon.

name: Copper knife
desc: A glittering copper knife.

name: Crude bow
desc: A crude but functional bow.

name: Crystal battleaxe
desc: It's see-through and tears through.

name: Dead Raiser
desc: Sacrifice a bit of blood to raise the dead. Upgrade the skull to spawn multiple skeletons, and increase your blood magic to make them stronger.

name: Demolisher
desc: This mighty sledge yearns to wreak havoc.

name: Draugr Fang
desc: Dark wood strung with glistening sinew. A vicious thing.

name: Dundr
desc: What happens next may shock you.

name: Fang spear
desc: Even in death, the wolf's tooth aches for flesh.

name: Finewood bow
desc: A simple bow of strong and supple wood.

name: Fire arrow
desc: This arrow burns whatever it pierces.

name: Flametal mace
desc: Dense yet spiked flametal, perfect for bashing enemy faces in.

name: Flametal missile
desc: Forged from one of the hardest metals in all of Valheim, this missile is sure to hold off your enemies.

name: Flametal shield
desc: The shield is and always will be a viking's most important weapon.

name: Flesh Rippers
desc: If claws work for wolves, why not for a viking?

name: Flint axe
desc: Sharper than stone.

name: Flint knife
desc: Sharpened flint. A reliable tool.

name: Flint spear
desc: If your eye marks a thing for death, let your arm send the messenger.

name: Flinthead arrow
desc: A hide-breaker with a head of flint.

name: Frost arrow
desc: A shard of piercing ice.

name: Frostner
desc: The dead fear silver. Remind them why.

name: Himminafl
desc: It might not be a hammer, but Thor himself would still approve of this weapon.

name: Huntsman bow
desc: Finely worked and strung. A huntsman's joy.

name: Iron atgeir
desc: Blood-drinker, skull-cracker, death-bringer.

name: Iron axe
desc: Sharp and strong, a woodcutter's friend.

name: Iron bolt
desc: A sturdy iron missile.

name: Iron buckler
desc: Its lightness and curved center makes it excellent for deflecting attacks.

name: Iron mace
desc: A fist-sized lump of iron on a wooden shaft.

name: Iron sledge
desc: A mighty hammer, worthy of a champion.

name: Iron sword
desc: The straight line between life and death runs along the edge of this blade.

name: Iron tower shield
desc: A tall shield of strong iron.

name: Ironhead arrow
desc: Capped with iron and flighted with dark feathers.

name: Jotun Bane
desc: Not even the giants of old could weather the poisonous bite of this weapon.

name: Krom
desc: As deadly as it is shiny, and it's very shiny.

name: Mistwalker
desc: The faint glow seems to slice through the mist.

name: Needle arrow
desc: The final stitch.

name: Nidhögg
desc: Named after the evil dragon that dwells by the roots of the world tree, this sword heralds doom for those who cross its path.

name: Obsidian arrow
desc: A sliver of darkness.

name: Ooze bomb
desc: The stench is unbearable...

name: Poison arrow
desc: A bitter sting from afar.

name: Porcupine
desc: A deadly weapon, bristling with fiendish spikes.

name: Ripper
desc: Rips your foes apart, simple as that.

name: Serpent scale shield
desc: A sturdy shield of overlapping scales.

name: Silver arrow
desc: A needle to calm restless spirits.

name: Silver knife
desc: A savage piece of pain.

name: Silver shield
desc: A shield of radiant silver.

name: Silver sword
desc: Purest of metals, nothing unclean can abide its touch.

name: Skoll and Hati
desc: Stab once for those who've betrayed you, and twice for those you hate.

name: Slayer
desc: This mighty blade thirsts for the blood of foes.

name: Smoke bomb
desc: Everyone knows you can't breathe in the smoke.

name: Spinesnap
desc: Using this bow is backbreaking work but so worth it.

name: Splitnir
desc: Split your enemies' hearts in two.

name: Staff of Embers
desc: The sweltering heat of Muspelheim seems almost pathetic when compared to what this staff can do...

name: Staff of Fracturing
desc: Only those with patience and focus will be able to harness the true power of this staff.

name: Staff of Frost
desc: A staff as cold as the three-year winter that will herald the end of times.

name: Staff of Protection
desc: For a slight blood offering it will protect the caster in a magical shell.

name: Staff of the Wild
desc: Ancient natural forces lie curled and dormant within this staff, ready to be unleashed.

name: Stagbreaker
desc: A weapon worthy of the Gods! If you get hit with this, you'll know it…

name: Stone axe
desc: A crude axe for tree-felling.

name: Torch
desc: It brings light and warmth, drives back the darkness.

name: Trollstav
desc: Summons a raging beast to cause death and destruction.

name: Wood arrow
desc: An arrow of sharpened wood.

name: Wood shield
desc: A simple wooden shield.

name: Wood tower shield
desc: A rough but heavy wooden shield.

name: Wooden missile
desc: Sturdy wooden missiles that can provide a tough defense against foes.
